title: Sudney
author: Sudney
content: Randall Crater (My Big Coin); Uncovering the truth behind the CFTC wrongdoing. Why Does This Matter? Why Should I Care? This case is a “bellwether” case in the cryptocurrency industry, meaning that the outcome will shape all cases going forward. Randall Crater and his defense team presented extensive exonerating evidence, which resulted in witnesses being intimidated, evidence being suppressed, and an attempt to financially ruin Crater and his family.For more information, check out https://substack.com/profile/100654583-sherlocalso RandallCrater.infoNew podcast: https://www.podbean.com/ew/pb-pkmww-12ba6fa

comments.author: BADecker
comments.created_time: September 08, 2022, 02:07:02 PMLast edit: September 08, 2022, 02:24:21 PM by BADecker
comments.body: People need the mindset that it isn't government that is fighting them. Rather, it is other people who are fighting them.People need to realize that everything that is done is done by some form of contract. Fed Gov doesn't have the authority to act against people without people signing something that shows that they are under government control.People who hire an attorney are placing themselves under control of the courts. The term is "ward of the court."
